attributes.action: sex education for 5-7 year olds (primary schools)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: My little girl who is 7, came home knowing bits about sex educaton and they want to teach 5 year olds.  Surely kids are entitled to a childhood and don't need to know this at such an early age.  Children should be taught English and maths and not about sex.  Many 5 year olds can't ride a bike or write there own name please sign against this if you agree with me thanks
